Texts.Chs: 如果蜜蜂没有可以授粉的花朵便会不高兴，去找一些^orange;红色的花^white;种在蜜蜂农场周围吧！这样蜜蜂们就会嗡嗡嗡地飞过去采蜜了。
Texts.Eng: Bees won't be happy without flowers to pollinate. Get a ^orange;red flower^white; to plant next to your apiary and your bees will get going!

Texts.Chs: 几乎所有的花朵可以产蜜，这时你只需要一点点的耐心。因为蜜蜂只在白天时才会出来活动，不过也有一些只在夜间活动的蜜蜂。
Texts.Eng: Pretty much any flower will do, by the way. And be patient. Bees take time to breed, and they only ^orange;'do it'^reset; when there are flowers and sun. Bee Flowers are their favorite, and will make them work hardest.
